query:
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_purchases_pipeline_summary;
CREATE VIEW vw_purchases_pipeline_summary AS
SELECT
  pr.status,
  pr.urgency,
  pr.sector AS category,
  COUNT(*) AS requestCount,
  SUM(COALESCE(pr.totalEstimated, 0)) AS estimatedValueSum
FROM purchase_requests pr
GROUP BY pr.status, pr.urgency, pr.sector;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3uYwUxtivMj8soi.e2c3e95bc24b --database aAFi3UvfwvVXettMY36Wvq --execute DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_purchases_pipeline_summary;
CREATE VIEW vw_purchases_pipeline_summary AS
SELECT
  pr.status,
  pr.urgency,
  pr.sector AS category,
  COUNT(*) AS requestCount,
  SUM(COALESCE(pr.totalEstimated, 0)) AS estimatedValueSum
FROM purchase_requests pr
GROUP BY pr.status, pr.urgency, pr.sector;
